attributes.action: Enable the fair power of the English people via their appointed MP's to vote on English matters alone, such as schools and hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that a fair policy is needed for the English people to have the right to decide on matters that govern English life via their appointed MP's as in the case for some Scottish policy's. Scottish/Welsh/Northern Island MP's should not be able to Vote on English matters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
